headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get The Many Wives of Alfredo Smith T-Shirt
content: Fancy presenting yourself as a bit of a cinephile at your next shindig? Show your appreciation for the tortured ex-stock car driver with a penchant for marrying the same woman, over and over and over again: all players will receive The Many Wives of Alfredo Smith T-Shirt, simply for logging in this week.
